Plot: Krrish and his scientist father have to save the world and their own family from an evil man named Kaal and his gang of mutants, led by the ruthless Kaya.
Title: Krrish 3
Writer: Rakesh Roshan (story), Robin Bhatt (screenplay), Honey Irani (screenplay), Irfan Kamal (screenplay), Akarsh Khurana (screenplay), Rakesh Roshan (screenplay), Sanjay Masoom (dialogue), David Benullo (story)
Actors: Priyanka Chopra, Hrithik Roshan, Amitabh Bachchan, Kangana Ranaut
